xsd:annotation.xsd:documentation: MindManager application schema
*** Core and Primitive types imports ***
*** Object types ***
Topic is an object that can be either part of tree structure as a root topic, as a sub-topic or as a floating topic
Relationship is an object that connects two topics
Map is an object that contains one root topic and zero or more relationships
Map part; contains one topic
Boundary is an object that represents boundary around topic
Image is an object that represents graphical image within topic
Ink sketch is an object that represents ink based image within topic
Abstract marker repersent assignable property with special meaning; has name
Set of abstract icon markers; contains all kinds of icon markers
Set of text markers
Style defenition; contains style group property
User settings definition; global root element of user settings xml
Markers set defenition; contains all kind of markers
*** Marker types ***
Abstract icon marker
Text marker
Stock icon marker; has one stock icon
Custom icon marker; has one custom icon
Task percentage marker; has task percentage
Task priority marker; has task priority
Task category marker; has task category
Task resource marker; has task resource
Task time marker; has task time
Text color marker; has text color
Fill color marker; has fill color
*** Object elements ***
Map global element
Relationship global element
Image global element
Ink sketch global element
Boundary global element
Style group global element
Markers set group global element
Style global element
Map user settings global element
Topics global element
Subtopics global element
Floating topics global element
Map global element
Map template global element
Map part global element
MarkersSet part global element
*** Elements ***
Comment global element
TableBusinessData global element
CustomPropertiesBusinessData global element
Formulas global element
TopicFormulas global element
*** Group types ***
Group of default properties; is a base for all default groups for specific object types
Group of per-view properties; is a base for all per-view groups for specific object types
Group of properties and offset from referenced topic (one of two) for containing relationship
Group of style properties for containing document
Group of markers for containing document
Icons group for containing topic
Notes group for containing topic or document
Ink group for containing topic
Attachment group for containing topic
Hyperlink group for containing topic
*** ViewGroup types ***
Per-view group of properties for containing map
Per-view group of properties for containing topic
Per-view group of properties for a topic with a given id
Per-view group of properties for containing relationship
Per-view group of properties for containing boundary
Per-view group of properties for containing image
Per-view group of properties for containing ink sketch
*** DefaultsGroup types ***
Group of default properties for topics
Group of default properties for topics at the specified level in tree structure
Group of default properties for topics with name and unique identifer
Group of default properties for relationships with name and unique identifer
Group of default properties for boundaries with name and unique identifer
Group of default properties for relationships
Group of default properties for boundaries
Group of default properties for image
*** OneObject types ***
Topic object (root topic) property for containing document
Boundary object property for containing topic
Image object property for containing topic
Ink sketch object property for containing topic
*** Objects types ***
Topics property contains topic objects; is a base for sub-topics and floating topics property
Sub-topics property contains sub-topic objects for containing parent topic
Floating topics property contains floating topic objects for containing parent topic or parent relationship
Relationships for containing document
Icon markers set for containing document
Icon markers for containing icon marker set
Text markers set for containing document
Text markers for containing text marker set
Task percentage markers set for containing document
Task priority markers set for containing document
Task category markers set for containing document
Task resource markers set for containing document
Text color markers set for containing document
Fill color markers set for containing document
link type for document link
document link types
64-bit universal bit set
access types
*** BinaryData types ***
Image data property of containing image
Alternate images for when image data cannot be displayed
Binary part of notes property content
Binary ink data of containing topic
Binary ink data of containing topic
Binary data for attachment
*** XhtmlTextData types ***
Notes XHTML data
*** ImageData types ***
Background image for style group of containing document
Preview image for containing document or notes
Custom icon image data
Preview image for custom data container
Topic shape property for containing topic
*** TopicShape types ***
Topic shape property for containing sub-topic
Topic shape property for containing label floating topic
Topic shape property for containing callout floating topic
*** Value types ***
Text property for containing topic; has rich text formatting as list of font ranges and list of ignore spelling ranges
Icons property for containing topic; has list of icons
Text Labels property for containing topic; has list of Text Labels
Line style property for containing relationship or boundary
Line Shape for relationships
Auto Routing option for relationships
Offset property from parent topic for containing topic
Font descriptor; internal element of Text property
Color property for containing topic, relationship or boundary; has line color and fill color
Color property for containing text label marker (tag)
Structure options property for style group of containing document
User (creator, last modificator, author) property for containing document
Language property for containing document
Collapsed state property for containing per-view group of topic
Zooming factor property for containing per-view group of document
Selection of selectable objects property for containing per-view group of document
Scroll Position property for containing per-view group of document
Planning information property for containing topic
Hyperlink property for containing topic
Indexed (multiple) hyperlink property for containing topic
Visibility state property for containing per-view group of topic
Background fill for style group of containing document
3D look property for style group of containing document
Sub-topics structure shape property for containing topic
Sub-topics structure visibility property for containing topic
Connection style property (one of two) for containing relationship
Visibility options property for style group of containing document
Version property for containing document
Boundary shape property for containing boundary
Image size property of containing image
FontRange descriptor; extends Font with from-to inclusive range description; internal element of Text property;
Topic layout property for containing topic
Bookmark for containing topic
Statistics for containing document
Date-time stamps for containing document
Description for containing document
Keywords for containing document
Company information for containing document
Password for modified protected
Category for containing document
Hyperlink options for containing document
Spacing stretch Factor property for style group of containing document

Connection object reference and coordinates property (one of two) for containing relationship
Object that appears to be the root of the map instead of the central topic

Pdf Export options for containing document

Defines text alignment color for a range of cells

Contains data for business topic with custom data container type
